title: Almanzor and Almanzaida a novel / written by Sir Philip Sidney, and found since his death amongst his papers.
author: La Roche-Guihen, Mlle de (Anne), 1644-1707.
publisher: Printed for J. Magnes and R. Bentley ...,
notes: Attributed to Mlle. de LaRoche-Guihen. Cf. BM.
The bookseller's attribution to Sidney is erroneous.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
